name: Tiny Copter Light
description:
Fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action arcade game the Tiny Copter!

Prepare for a near impossible challenge on your reaction and prediction on your flight line. Push your skills to the limit as you fly your way through dangerous obstacles such as balloons, trucks, clouds etc. Also you`ve got a limited fuel, so you need to collect jerrycans to refuel you Tiny Copter.

Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours! it's quick and a good time-passer.

Compete for the best score in the world & rise your ingame rank!

Flying with a Tiny Copter hat is not easy.

[HOW TO PLAY] 
• Tap and hold to fly higher. Release to go down. 
• Avoid obstacles. 
• Collect jerrycans. Don`t try to collect all cans, it will help you to avoid obstacles.

Enjoy the game! Tiny Copter will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes!
How far can you make it?

Very simple, but challenging. it's quick and a good time-passer.
